about_data.title: Felipe Scherer
about_data.text: Hello, my name is Felipe Scherer and I have several hobbies that inspire me and motivate me to be a more complete person. Programming is one of my great passions, especially Python, which led me to research more and more on the subject. I currently work with Javascript as a web frontend, but my goal is to specialize in low-level languages, such as C++, for game development. I believe that programming is an art, just like any other human production, and mathematical logic is fundamental to solving proposed problems. Furthermore, I am also passionate about graphic art, including drawings, layouts and compositions. My desire is to study more about the art of drawing, as this is an area that I have not yet fully mastered. I have a degree in Computer Science and I am always looking for new opportunities to learn and improve.

toolkit.title: Toolkit
toolkit.text: I am constantly improving and dedicating myself to studies in different areas of coding. I believe it is important to always be up to date and seek new knowledge to evolve in your career and grow professionally. Furthermore, I am always looking for new learning opportunities, courses, training, events and experiences that can add value to my knowledge and skills. Among the areas in which I dedicate myself with enthusiasm and interest are:
